document.masterDocTitle: New data on the fauna of China, part I: the taxonomy of the millipede family Julidae (Diplopoda)

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: New data on the fauna of China, part I: the taxonomy of the millipede family Julidae (Diplopoda)

subSubSection.paragraph:
Type species:
Chromatoiulus loebli Mauriès, 1983
(preoccupied, substituted by
Nepalmatoiulus ivanloebli
), by original designation.
